forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy early with peeks of sunshine expected late. High around 15C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy skies this morning will become partly cloudy this afternoon. High 59F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies late. Low 49F. Winds light and variable.
